author: Staff Reporter
text:
Solar scam accused Saritha Nair appeared before a Coimbatore court on Wednesday. She has been accused of cheating investors in Coimbatore.

Talking to reporters here she said that she had presented evidences to the inquiry commission in Kerala and claimed that those were enough to indict Kerala Chief Minister Oommen Chandy.

Denying political motives behind accusing the Chief Minister, she said that she had no political aspirations.
title: Saritha Nair appears in court
